title: Start
body:
Hi! 
I haven't seen you around here before, I'm Hana,
What's your name, sweetie?
-> [$name], What is this place?
    You really must not be from around here, huh?
    -> What's that supposed to mean?
        All the stray cats know about the Cat Cafe! It's kind of a sanctuary for us strays. Free food and everything! 
    -> No, I'm not.
        Well this is the Cat Cafe! It's kind of a sanctuary for us strays. Free food and everything!
        -> I'm not a stray! My owner is missing, I'm looking for him. He left this key behind, do you know what it is?
            Oh, you're so brave! 
            Hmm...No, I don't, but I know who would! You should find Akio, he knows everything! I'd look on the rooftops, that's usually where he hangs out,
            -> Thanks, Hana.
See you around, [$name]!
